form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service Medical Examination of Aliens Seeking Adjustment of Status ( Form 1-693 ( (02/1478)

full_text: U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1987-175-6047 #84 9th OMB #1115-0134 U.S. Department of Justice Medical Examination of Aliens Seeking Immigration and Naturalization Service Adjustment of Status (P. L. 99 603) (Please Type or Print Clearly) DATE OF MO DA YR FILE / certify that on the date shown / examined: EXAMIN- ATION 051587 No. NAME: LAST FIRST MI DATE OF MO DA YR COUNTRY OF BIRTH: BIRTH: MONTESDEOCA, ANDREA 110401 MEXICO ADDRESS: STREET CITY STATE ZIP 3100 SIERRA ST LOS ANGELES CALIFORNIA 90031 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability he conditions listed below were found (check boxes that apply) CLASS A Conditions CLASS B Conditions Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Other : Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Other Physical Defect, Disease Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One Mental Defect aed TRC Procen- or Disability: Insanity or More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST CHEST X-RAY REPORT FROM Doctor FROM Doctor FIRST STREET MEDICAL (Please Print) (Please Print) MO DA YR REACTION MO DA YR mm NORMAL NO REACTION NOT DONE ABNORMAL NOT DONE 051507 DATE READ DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS TEST TYPE VDRL TEST TYPE FROM Doctor FIRST STREET MEDICAL FROM Doctor (Please Print) (Please Print) REACTIVE TITER MO DA YR REACTIVE TITER MO DA YR NONREACTIVE 051587 NONREACTIVE DATE READ DATE READ IMMUNIZATION DETERMINATION ( DTP, OPV, MMR, Td - Refer to PHS Guidelines for recommendations.) Applicant is current for recommended age-specific immunizations Applicant is not current for recommended age-specific immunizations REMARKS: Probably old TBC - Haiveres and none I have encouraged that appropriate immunizations be obtained 2ns, to Health Dept pr definiting evaluation CIVIL SURGEON REFERRAL FOR FOLLOW-UP OF MEDICAL CONDITION Parence Auman The alien named above has applied for adjustment of status. A medical examination conducted by me identified the conditions above which require resolution before medical clearance is granted or for which the alien may seek medical advice. Please provide follow-up services or refer the alien to an appropriate health care provider. The actions necessary for medical clearance are detailed on the reverse of this form. FOLLOW-UP INFORMATION SIGNATURE TITLE MO DA YR The alien named above has complied with recommended health follow-up. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION SIGNATURE MO DA YR I certify that the information contained in this form refers to me. 051527 CIVIL SURGEON CERTIFICATION SIGNATURE TITLE MO DA YR My examination showed the applicant to have met the medical examination and health follow-up Han WD requirements for adjustment of status. The Immigration and Naturalization Service is authorized to collect this information under the provisions of the Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986, Public Law 99-603 The individually identified data requested is required in order for a proper evaluation to be made of your health status, and may be shared with health depart- ments and other public health or cooperating medical authorities. The medical examination must be completed in order for us to process your application. Form I-693 (02/14/87) ORIGINAL: INS A-FILE
